Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory172.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGoldDustLightWall.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard Captain', 3: "Keep the reinforcements coming! Don't let the Corrupted breach our defenses!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The withdrawal of the Ascendants does not signal the end of the war. The Corrupted, war machines left behind by the Ascendants, must still be cleansed.'}
{3: 'The rudderless Corrupted begin to run amok, driven not by purpose, but by their killer instinct. Kowloong can only reinforce their defenses.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "By the looks of things, it's only a matter of time before we win this, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Perhaps. But we only got rid of one of the Ascendants...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'But before she left, that fish lady mentioned something about Roland retreating.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Even that only makes two. Gabriel, Alpha, and according to the report, their leader, Luna, might still be here somewhere.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "We can't let our guard down until we get a visual confirmation. Kamui, let's keep searching.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Comms' ringing...", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "You must be Strike Hawk. I'm Bridget of the Support Force.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I've read about you before. Do you require our help?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Not me. It's Lucia, member of Gray Raven, that's asking for help.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Gray Raven? What happened to them?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'They seem to be trapped inside the core area, you know, through that light wall. After losing contact with them for a while, the president got Lucia a new frame and sent her after them.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Losing contact...? Could they be in danger? And how did Lucia get separated from the squad?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "It's a long story. Anyway, the clock is ticking—", 4: '3'}

{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Lucia has been assigned an aircraft for this mission, and now she's on her way over. Could you please find a way to crack the light wall open ASAP so she could enter the core area?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Yes, you can count on us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "The aircraft is armed, but the gear is unlikely to do any damage to the wall. We'll be counting on you!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Hold on, why did you say yes?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "You're not gonna say no, though. Right, Capt.?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'At least wait until we get more info. Do you even know how to get the wall open?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Uh... Good people of Kowloong? A clue maybe?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui casually directs the question at the Kowloong guards next to him. Though they did fight together, the guards are still trying their best to avoid unnecessary contact with outsiders.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Please, guys? My comrades are trapped in there. Just tell me how to open the light wall, I'll do anything for you in return!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Same here...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Without any hesitation, Kamui bows, pleading for the guards to tell him how to open the light wall. Chrome follows suit.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard Captain', 3: '...Since there have been no new instructions from Lady Qu, I guess I might as well talk to myself. Not my fault if someone eavesdrops.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Without so much as a glance at the two, the guard captain begins talking, pointing at the explosives originally prepared for battle.'}
{2: 'Guard Captain', 3: 'Lady Qu is the only person who can open the light wall. But apparently, you can also use powerful explosives to create temporary cracks in the wall.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard Captain', 3: "With so many Corrupted running around, there's no telling if they might cause something to blow up.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Haha, thanks! You got all that, Capt.?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Looks like we'll have to play as a pair of Corrupted, then.", 4: '2'}
